name: OB_DEL_PROC
description: This table contains the category values which correspond to procedures that occur during or immediately following the delivery. This data is documented in the Delivery Summary.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the summary block record. The delivery record ID on which the data is stored.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: DEL_PROC_C_NAME
columns.description: The category values which correspond to procedures that occur during or immediately following the delivery. This data is documented in the Delivery Summary.
